page.title: 04PROBLEMS OF BRICK MAKING
page.content: The main issues in the Stewartby area are: 1 Planning: a) how can the national importance of Oxford clay resources be recognised and supplies be conserved? b) to what extent can the impact of the clay extraction process on landscape and settlements be minimised? c) how can the rate of restoration on exhausted, current and future sites be accelerated? d) how can the problem of pollution from the brickworks be resolved? 2 Environment: a) how can management guidelines be formulated to protect areas of landscape and wildlife? b) how can the company work with the County Council to achieve a)?
